snippet.title: Trash Invasion: Waste Recycle | Monster Collection. Game Trailer
snippet.description:
What if all the trash in our world became alive? How could we stop it?
Get it on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.differentwaygames.trashinvasion

Destroy trash items, capture monsters, defeat final bosses, collect coins, get gifts, bonuses and unlock unique levels. Learning to recycle has never been more fun - throw trash in the correct bin, get rewards and enjoy fun facts and tips. Save the "Tree of Wisdom", learn, equip yourself and save our world! Literally. Available Now!

Trash Invasion is an educational, recycling game. Contains tips and fun facts about waste in our world and how to help reduce pollution by recycling trash. One of the recommended waste sorting games for kids as well as for adults. Start your journey to help our Earth now virtually and in real life.

How to play:
Tap quickly on trash items to destroy them. Tap quickly on monsters to capture them. To recycle - throw items in the correct trash bin. Collect coins to unlock more monsters. Assign monsters to cards to help you wipe out all garbage and progress faster. Learn useful tricks about how to manage waste in real life.

Features:
★ Multiple trash types
★ Different themes
★ Extra bonus level
★ Collecting monsters (monster boost cards)
★ Monster gifts area
★ Final boss areas
★ Daily coins bonus boost
★ Recycling tips and fun facts
★ Winter/Summer theme
★ Languages: English, Chinese, Russian, German, Bulgarian, Italian, Spanish
★ Completely FREE to play, No ads, No in-app purchases
★ New features, fixes and updates coming regularly

If you like this game, please give your rating and comments!

Enjoy!

Follow us for more information!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DifferentWayGam
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DifferentWayGames
itch io: https://differentwaygames.itch.io/
